thread.title: Last minute booking - lucky there was a cancellation!
thread.title_full: Last minute booking - lucky there was a cancellation! - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: 563jog
title: Last minute booking - lucky there was a cancellation!
text: After checking in to an unsuitable B&B I called Stellenbosch Hotel and discovered that they had just had a cancellation (they has been fully booked). What a relief! We only stayed for one night but the room was great - aircon, TV with DSTV, comfy beds and nice bathroom. Very clean. The breakfast next day was super. I have stayed there before and will definitely stay there again.
